message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $160. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $90, I'm willing to come down to $130. I believe this product offers great value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
